item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 8, 2025 at 12:35 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Using NASA’s SMAP satellite to detect L-band interference (160 points | 24 comments)

14. Mistral ships Le Chat – enterprise AI assistant that can run on prem (434 points | 124 comments)

22. Samsung is paying $350M for audio brands B&W, Denon, Marantz and Polk (158 points | 214 comments)

24. So Much Blood (404 points | 193 comments)
25. Bootstrapping Lisp in a Boot Sector (85 points | 4 comments)
26. Mac Themes Garden (179 points | 60 comments)
27. My quest to make motorcycle riding that tad bit safer (284 points | 335 comments)

29. Ghost students are creating problems for California colleges (118 points | 136 comments)
30. Yggdrasil is an experimental compact routing scheme that is fully decentralised (165 points | 46 comments)
